about_the_game:
Welcome to Pure Fun VR! An immersive NSFW adult VR game. Meet Nina and her sister Brandy, they both share a secret. They like it when you watch them while they play.

Invite Nina or Brandy or both into any of the three non-judgmental scenes and explore your most intimate desires. Touch them, move them, pose them.

The game has been designed to keep your hands free. Move the sisters in any desired pose or use the preset posses as an easy starting point. Let them play
together or place them onto of you.

With the easy recording functionality you can set a start and stop position for the body, hands and feet and animate the sisters to do whatever you want.

Slide into their VR world and enjoy the following features:

  • Both have their own sets of toys which are animated while your hands are occupied with more important bits.
  • Body fluids added in latest version. Use your right controller trigger to paint them white.
  • Grab the hand feet or waist to move them into any desired position.
  • Easy wrist access menu where you can change speed, poses and squirting
  • The game was built with physics in mind, body fluids will run off your VR hands.
  • Breasts are gradably and will jiggle when moving
  • Genitalia will move if touched with your VR hands
  • Three Scenes available each with their own look.
  • Facial expression.

Have Fun!

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains nudity and sexual content that are appropriate only for adults.

The Theme of the game is:
Arousal

legal_notice:
All characters are 18 age or older

This game contains naked woman and flirting scenes with sexual overtones, sex scenes.

All assets in the game was acquired under license with the provider. You are not allowed to redistribute any content in the game or export for use on another product or advertisement.
name: Pure Fun VR

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 and up
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
  • Sound Card: General
  • VR Support: Meta Quest 2 only
  • Additional Notes: The games is a VR experience, it cannot be played directly on a PC with a keyboard and mouse
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Pure Fun is a physics based Sex Simulation. Enter a world of the two sisters where you are the puppet master and let them play.
